message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,500,000. I'm confident this is a fair starting point for discussions.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget allows me to only pay up to $1,200,000. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
